Event.name: Pre_receiving
Event.definition: <def-root>The state-of-affairs immediately before the <fen>Recipient</fen> gets the <fen>Theme</fen> which describes the <fen>Recipient</fen>'s possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Recipient
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person who acts to come into possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Donor
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person who has the <fen>Theme</fen> and is about to give it to the <fen>Recipient</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition: <def-root>The entity that changes possession, beginning in the possession of the <fen>Donor</fen> and ending up with the <fen>Recipient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>A description of the way that the <fen>Recipient</fen> has the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the <fen>Time</fen> when the Pre_receiving event occurs. </def-root>
